## ParticleEmitterEventPayloads."PARTICLE\_EMITTER.SET\_LIFETIME" property

Emitted when the lifetime of an emitted particle is set.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[ParticleEmitterEvent.SET_LIFETIME]: {
        particleEmitter: ParticleEmitter;
        lifetime: number;
    };
```
